message.body: Hey, I'm uploading a rough draft of Smoke. Are you around this afternoon? I'd love to get your feedback b4 you leave town. I just want to make sure I'm not totally off base b4 I do anything more.
Hi! I just got to NY but can take a look if I have a second. About to meet some friends
Maybe I will send you some stills instead of the video.
Hi, again. I just emailed you a few shots. If you have a second, I'd love your feedback, but don't worry about it if not. Hope you are having FUN!!!!
I am gonna have Drew look at it too. I just need a reality check. :)
I will try to take a look! If you don't hear from me tonight you will tmw afternoon!
